game

Class Helipad

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
      • game.Helipad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.GroundInterface

    public class Helipad
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
    A ground where a helicopter lands, holds a list of keys required to enter the helicopter, will move the player to the location of this helipad if the player has the corresponding key to unlock the helicopter.
    Author:
    ziyaopiong
